0.text: Innate: Kayle ascends through four forms that each grant additional bonuses. She ascends upon spending a skill point at levels 1, 6, 11, and 16.
0.html: Innate: Kayle ascends through four forms that each grant additional bonuses. She ascends upon spending a skill point at levels 1, 6, 11, and 16.

1.text: Level 1 - Zealous: Kayle's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Zeal that lasts 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. For each stack, she gains  6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to a maximum  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP). At max stacks, she becomes Exalted, gaining  8% bonus movement speed.
1.html: Level 1 - Zealous: Kayle's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Zeal that lasts 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. For each stack, she gains  6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to a maximum  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP). At max stacks, she becomes Exalted, gaining  8% bonus movement speed.

2.text: Level 6 - Arisen: Kayle becomes  ranged and gains  350 bonus attack range for a total of  525.
2.html: Level 6 - Arisen: Kayle becomes ranged and gains  350 bonus attack range for a total of  525.

3.text: Level 11 - Aflame: Kayle gains 10% bonus size. While Kayle is Exalted, her basic attacks on-attack also launch a wave of fire forward that deals 15 − 35 (based on  Starfire Spellblade's Rank) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to all enemies it passes through. The wave is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
3.html: Level 11 - Aflame: Kayle gains 10% bonus size. While Kayle is Exalted, her basic attacks on-attack also launch a wave of fire forward that deals 15 − 35 (based on Starfire Spellblade's Rank) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to all enemies it passes through. The wave is affected by critical strike modifiers.

0.text: 15 − 35 (based on  Starfire Spellblade's Rank)

4.text: Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle gains an additional  100 bonus attack range for a total of  625, and permanently gains the full effects of Zealous.
4.html: Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle gains an additional  100 bonus attack range for a total of  625, and permanently gains the full effects of Zealous.

0.text: RANGE:  900

Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction, from which a celestial sword launches forward. The sword expands upon hitting an enemy, targets struck in the area are dealt magic damage,  slowed for 2 seconds, and inflicted with 15% reduced  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction, from which a celestial sword launches forward. The sword expands upon hitting an enemy, targets struck in the area are dealt magic damage, slowed for 2 seconds, and inflicted with 15% reduced  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  900
Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are  healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

1.text: If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the lowest  health.
1.html: If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the lowest  health.

0.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  350
Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage  on-hit. The waves from  Divine Ascent have base damage equal to this effect's base damage.
0.html: Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage on-hit. The waves from Divine Ascent have base damage equal to this effect's base damage.

1.text: Active: Kayle kindles her blade, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup and deal additional bonus magic damage  on-hit that is capped at 400 against  monsters. If Kayle is not yet  Arisen, this attack becomes  ranged with  525 range.
1.html: Active: Kayle kindles her blade, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an uncancellable windup and deal additional bonus magic damage on-hit that is capped at 400 against monsters. If Kayle is not yet Arisen, this attack becomes ranged with  525 range.

0.content: 8 / 8.5 / 9 / 9.5 / 10% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's missing health

2.text: Aflame Bonus: The attack explodes upon the target, dealing its damage to surrounding enemies and applying  on-hit effects. This is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
2.html: Aflame Bonus: The attack explodes upon the target, dealing its damage to surrounding enemies and applying on-hit effects. This is affected by critical strike modifiers.

3.text: Starfire Spellblade  resets Kayle's basic attack timer.
3.html: Starfire Spellblade resets Kayle's basic attack timer.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  900
Active: Kayle grants herself or a target allied champion  invulnerability for a few seconds and conjures swords of fire.
0.html: Active: Kayle grants herself or a target allied champion invulnerability for a few seconds and conjures swords of fire.

1.text: When she finishes the cast, she rains the swords down around the target, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: When she finishes the cast, she rains the swords down around the target, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

0.text: Innate: Kayle ascends through four forms that each grant additional bonuses. She ascends upon spending a skill point at levels 1, 6, 11, and 16.

For each stack, she gains  6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to a maximum  30% (+ 5% per 100 AP). At max stacks, she becomes Exalted, gaining  8% bonus movement speed.

Active: Kayle grants herself or a target allied champion  invulnerability for a few seconds and conjures swords of fire.

0.concerningText: Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are  healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Active: Kayle grants herself or a target allied champion  invulnerability for a few seconds and conjures swords of fire.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction, from which a celestial sword launches forward. The sword expands upon hitting an enemy, targets struck in the area are dealt magic damage,  slowed for 2 seconds, and inflicted with 15% reduced  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are  healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are  healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

origin: 8 / 8.5 / 9 / 9.5 / 10% (+ 1.5% per 100 ap) of target's missing health
